oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COMPUTER EVALUATION OF LITTORAL TRANSPORT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mogel, Theodor R.
Street, Robert L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: littoral transport
computer aid
computer evaluation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hindcast deepwater wave statistics and bottom hydrographic data are combined with a water-wave refraction analysis to estimate the littoral transport in a beach zone. The effects of hindcast data station location, of wave ray density in the breaker zone, of changes in the bottom-fitting surface in the depth calculation of the refraction analysis, and of methods of smoothing the contribution of individual rays to the littoral transport computation are explored.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 14 (1974): Proceedings of 14th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1974.; 41
